duties_responsibilities.duty: Build, oversee, and maintain the company’s projected long-term operating model and develop all pricing models.
Lead annual budgeting and planning process in partnership with senior management.
Collaborate with external stakeholders to build strong relationships and support the company's financial objectives.
Manage day-to-day financial operations, including accounting, payroll, billing, and collections.
Oversee compliance with appropriate GAAP standards and regulatory requirements.
Engage with audit and finance committees around issues and trends in financial operating models and delivery.
